首先当然要搞个川三篇。


《特朗普视察国会大厦》
2017-01-20

Together, we will make America strong again. We will make America wealthy again. We will make America proud again. We will make America safe again. And, yes, together, we will make America great again.
「今天，广大干部群众要不忘初心、牢记使命，以『我在必不成功』的精神境界和『攻拜锤城（指国会大厦）必定有我』的历史担当，保持历史耐心，发扬钉钉子精神，一张蓝图绘到底，一任接着一任干，啊，只有一任，在实现『两个一百两年』奋斗目标、实现美利坚民族伟大复兴美国梦的新征程上努力创造无愧于时代的新业绩！」


《特朗普与吴莱士谈笑风生》
2017-08-15

I think there's blame on both sides, you look at, you look at both sides, I think there's blame on both sides, and I have no doubt about it, and you don't have any doubt about it either. If you reported it accurately, you would say that the neo-Nazis started this thing. They showed up in Charlottesville. Excuse me. They didn't put themselves down as neo-Nazis. You had some very bad people in that group. You also had some very fine people on both sides.
「我们爱国无罪。」


《特朗普怒斥 ISIS 领导》
2019-10-27

"Terrorists who oppress and murder innocent people should never sleep soundly, knowing that we will completely destroy them. These savage monsters will not escape their fate – and they will not escape the final judgement of God."
「实际上那些恐怖主义者，他也是有一本帐的，这个帐是记在那儿的。一旦他出事了，这个帐全给你拉出来了。别看你今天闹得欢，小心啊，今后拉清单，这都得应验的。不要干这种事情。头上三尺有真主，一定要有敬畏之心。」

I don't want to say how, but we had absolutely perfect — as though you were watching a movie. It was — that — that in — the technology there alone is — is really great.
